Their platform, continuous-eval, is an open-source modular framework for evaluating metrics in text generation, code generation, retrieval, classification, agents, and other LLM use cases. The cloud platform also generates synthetic data and simulates user behavior to stress test GenAI applications.

By bridging the gap between HR and payroll, Malibou integrates with recently opened French payroll APIs to offer a comprehensive HR and payroll solution.

name: Kart AI
description: Kart AI offers an AI-powered shopping assistant for e-commerce retailers, similar to Amazon's Rufus, enabling personalized, conversational shopping experiences across online stores.

name: Anglera
description: Anglera provides AI agents for e-commerce companies, helping with product data management, reducing processing time, and automating workflows based on prior experience with Uber Eats.

name: XTraffic
description: XTraffic delivers affordable, intelligent traffic light systems for cities by leveraging advancements in sensor technology, currently operational in multiple pilot locations to reduce traffic and improve safety.

name: Felafax
description: Felafax is building an AI infrastructure stack optimized for non-NVIDIA GPUs, providing a more cost-effective alternative to traditional AI computing hardware.

name: Hey Revia
description: Hey Revia is a voice AI service for healthcare providers, automating complex phone tasks like provider verification and insurance updates, offered through web, mobile, and API options.

name: Pipeshift
description: Pipeshift is a platform for fine-tuning, distilling, and deploying open-source LLMs, aimed at companies needing high-frequency model calls with optimized performance and ownership of AI models.

name: Vera Health
description: Vera Health provides AI-powered clinical decision support, offering instant access to evidence-based medical answers for healthcare providers, improving speed and quality of patient care.

name: Pharos
description: Pharos automates hospital quality reporting, extracting data from medical records to save on labor costs and identify areas of preventable patient harm.

name: et al.
description: et al. is an app that aggregates newsletters, research papers, and articles, using LLMs to deliver concise insights from each source, helping users stay informed efficiently.

name: Terra
description: Terra is a platform connecting product creators with suppliers, expediting sample requests, and enabling real-time production tracking to simplify overseas manufacturing.

name: Diode Computers, Inc.
description: Diode automates hardware design, simulating the role of a senior electronic engineer to create and manufacture custom printed circuit boards in minutes using generative AI models.
one_liner: Automate circuit board design using AI.

name: Usul
description: Usul supports companies in winning defense contracts by providing AI-based collaboration tools for US companies and allies to develop and market next-generation military technology.
one_liner: Win Defense Contracts with AI.

name: Saldor
description: Saldor leverages formal verification to guide large language models (LLMs) to achieve correctness in output, combining symbolic and neural methods.
one_liner: Neurosymbolic AI.

name: Bucket Robotics
description: Bucket Robotics improves defect detection in manufacturing, providing user-friendly, integrated robotic solutions to reduce waste and enhance quality assurance using experience from the self-driving industry.
one_liner: Defect detection for manufacturing built from CAD and synthetic data.

name: Elayne
description: Elayne automates estate planning and settlements, providing a unified platform to support families in wealth transfers and reducing the burden of manual, time-intensive estate management.
one_liner: AI family estate planning & settlements after death.

name: Blaze
description: Blaze is a cross-border peer-to-peer payments app that uses USDC to facilitate quick, affordable payments worldwide, available for iOS and Android.
one_liner: Global Venmo for cross-border payments.

name: pap!
description: pap! automatically claims refunds, compensation, and unclaimed funds for consumers from email receipts, ensuring they don’t miss out on eligible earnings.
one_liner: Agents that earn consumers dollars when they shop, travel, and live.

name: Mindely
description: Mindely is an AI interviewer designed for skill assessment in high-volume hiring, offering adaptive and unbiased interviews tailored to specific job roles.
one_liner: The first GenAI interviewer for skills assessment interviews.

name: TradeFlow
description: TradeFlow uses AI to streamline the financial securities settlement process, reducing reliance on manual communication and disparate systems.
one_liner: AI-powered settlement for financial securities.

name: Voker
description: Voker is a no-code platform enabling product teams to build AI features independently, making it easier to improve customer experience without heavy engineering resources.
one_liner: No-Code AI Builder.

name: Quetzal
description: Quetzal is a language model-powered translation and internationalization suite that enables companies to deliver software and content in multiple languages instantly.
one_liner: Simple, LLM-first translation and internationalization for software.

name: Weavel
description: Weavel automates prompt and LLM engineering, delivering optimal prompts and algorithms faster and more efficiently than manual methods.
one_liner: Automate prompt & LLM engineering, 50x faster than a human.

name: Moreta
description: Moreta simplifies payments for international travelers by allowing them to pay local merchants using a mobile wallet, eliminating the need for cash or bank accounts abroad.
one_liner: Payments made easy for international travelers.

name: HYBRD
description: HYBRD is a comprehensive tracking app for elite hybrid athletes, integrating data from wearables to provide insights across both cardio and strength training.
one_liner: Strava for elite athletes.

name: Codebuff
description: Codebuff is a command-line interface (CLI) tool that allows developers to chat with an AI that can directly edit and manage code files in a project.
one_liner: Code with AI from our CLI.

name: Luthor
description: Luthor combines AI-generated content with expert human editing to produce high-quality, on-brand content for businesses.
one_liner: AI-powered content, expertly refined by humans who know your brand.

name: issen
description: issen is an AI conversational language tutor that adapts lessons to users' interests, helping them achieve fluency through personalized, on-demand voice interaction.
one_liner: Your conversational AI foreign language tutor.

name: Protegee
description: Protegee enables AI voice agents to securely handle payments over the phone, managing compliance and fraud prevention in the agentic economy.
one_liner: Payments API for AI agents.

name: Lightscreen AI
description: Lightscreen provides interactive AI-driven technical interviews, helping engineering teams assess candidates’ skills with unbiased, automated screening.
one_liner: Uncheatable, unbiased automated technical interviews.

name: Rulebase
description: Rulebase builds fraud detection models to prevent account takeovers and voice phishing, providing voice phishing simulations to train employees against threats.
one_liner: The AI voice fraud defense system for financial services.

name: Encore
description: Encore is a conversational search engine for online shopping, particularly in resale, allowing users to discover unique items across multiple platforms.
one_liner: Perplexity for online shopping.

name: Docflow
description: Docflow offers automated scheduling software tailored for hospital administrators, simplifying compliance and reducing manual scheduling work.
one_liner: Automated scheduling software for hospitals.

name: Galini
description: Galini provides compliance guardrails for AI applications, making it easy to deploy policies and reduce costs related to in-house build compliance.
one_liner: Compliance guardrails for AI apps.

name: Andoria
description: Andoria customizes onboarding experiences using AI to engage users, providing activation from day one with minimal setup required.
one_liner: AI customer onboarding manager.

name: Outerport
description: Outerport optimizes GPU use by enabling multiple AI models on a single GPU, reducing hardware needs and costs for companies.
one_liner: VMware for GPUs.

name: Friday
description: Friday is an AI-powered email assistant that handles routine emails, helping users focus on important messages while automating the rest.
one_liner: An assistant that understands your emails and handles them for you.

name: Ryvn
description: Ryvn manages infrastructure for applications, enabling deployment, monitoring, and management across customer clouds with ease.
one_liner: Deploy, monitor, and manage applications in customer clouds.

name: Fix AI
description: Fix AI automates frontend QA testing by simulating user interactions, identifying bugs with natural language prompts.
one_liner: AI agents that navigate websites like real users to find bugs.

name: Forerunner AI
description: Forerunner is an AI co-pilot for aerospace and defense engineering, accelerating workflows for rocket, munition, and satellite production.
one_liner: Copilot for aerospace engineers making rockets, munitions, satellites.
